channel.title: Rshiny on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in Rshiny on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Olympic : Rshiny Approach
item.description: Introduction Material Useful for Rsiny Development How To Use the Olympic Rshiny App 1. Choose a Country 2. Keep NA or Remove NA 3. Graph of Medals Over the Years 4. Information of Country 5. Summary of Country Introduction Rshiny is very popular in the rstats community. The glamourous interface and functionality has helped for this level of popularity. In perspective of using an Rshiny App anyone can use it with minimal amount of knowledge.
